remark.ch: 實習課時間為星期一晚上6點半到8點半。不在分發優先順序內或名額外學生請拿密碼卡。

goal.en: This course aims to help students understand the main purpose of financial reporting and the concept of IFRS, and to discuss how to prepare and explain corporate‘s operating, investing, and financing activities in financial reports under IFRS. *Review sessions by TA: Mon. evening 6:30 pm to 8:30 pm
goal.ch: 1 了解財務報告之目的 2 認識IFRS準則之精神 3 熟悉於IFRS精神下如何表達公司營運、投資及融資活動 4 理解並解讀企業各報表項目之意義 *星期一晚上6:30-8:30為實習課時間
